activities:
MindFire, Inc provides fast, efficient, and cost-effective electronic services for a variety of clients worldwide, for automation of cross-media marketing communication. As an industry leader, it is critical for MindFire, Inc to set the standard for the protection of information assets from unauthorized access and compromise or disclosure. Accordingly, MindFire, Inc has adopted a number of policies and frameworks to help manage and protect information assets of itself and its customers.

All associates of MindFire, Inc share in the responsibility for ensuring that the information assets of MindFire, Inc and its customers receive an appropriate level of protection by observing adherence to these policies.
eucountries: Czech Republic, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On line personal data processed by our customers
